title: Channel Islands National Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger             This program helps children discover and protect the wonders of the islands. Ask for a free junior ranger booklet at the visitor center or boat/plane concessionaire offices or on the islands from park staff. You may also download a PDF file of these booklets by clicking on the links below. These files require Adobe Reader. Please click here to download Adobe Reader for free.  Visitor Center Junior Ranger Booklet (PDF file, 1.3mb)   Visitor Center Junior Ranger Booklet Spanish Version (PDF file, 1.3mb)   Island Junior Ranger Booklet (PDF file, 1.6mb)    Island Junior Ranger Booklet Spanish Version (PDF file, 1.6mb)     NOTE: These booklets are set up on 8.5 x 14 inch paper. To fit on 8.5  x 11 inch paper, select reduce to fit on your printing options.       National Junior Ranger BookletsComplete the fun activities in the following booklets to become a:Junior Ranger Underwater ExplorerJunior Ranger PaleontologistJunior Ranger Wilderness ExplorerJunior Ranger Night ExplorerJunior Ranger Cave Scientist
